thread.title: 29 Of The Most Beautiful Quotes From TV
thread.title_full: 29 Of The Most Beautiful Quotes From TV

author: Jamie Jones
title: 29 Of The Most Beautiful Quotes From TV

organizations.name: buzzfeed community on facebook and twitter

text:
Submitted by taylorjean0909 Netflix / BuzzFeed ID: 10724786 2. “I wish there was a way to know you’re in the good old days before you’ve actually left them.”
– Andy Bernard, The Office 
Submitted by Sarah Hoskins, Facebook 
ID: 10724213 3. “And what exactly do you think fairy tales are? They are a reminder that our lives will get better if we just hold on to hope. Your happy ending may not be what you expect, but that is what will make it so special.”
– Snow White, Once Upon a Time 
Submitted by Megan Susan, Facebook 
ID: 10724600 4. View this image › 
Submitted by Emily Domhoff, Facebook Netflix / BuzzFeed 
ID: 10724699 5. “I don’t want normal, and easy, and simple. I want painful, difficult, devastating, life-changing, extraordinary love. Don’t you want that, too?”
– Olivia Pope, Scandal 
Submitted by angelas4e9a5f8c1 
ID: 10724710 6. “It’s always been you. I tried to fight it and I’ve tried to deny it. And I can’t do it. I can’t. You’re undeniable.”
– Seth Cohen, The O.C. 
Submitted by Lauren Ciara, Facebook 
ID: 10724602 7. View this image › 
Submitted by rebeccam4ae953e2d 20th Television / BuzzFeed 
ID: 10724724 8. “People don’t write sonnets about being compatible, or novels about shared life goals and stimulating conversation. The great loves are the crazy ones.”
– Blair Waldorf, Gossip Girl 
Submitted by Lauren Ciara, Facebook 
ID: 10724604 9. “The way I see it, every life is a pile of good things and bad things. The good things don’t always soften the bad things, but vice-versa, the bad things don’t necessarily spoil the good things and make them unimportant.”
– The Doctor, Doctor Who 
Submitted by Abby Friedman, Facebook 
ID: 10724608 10. View this image › 
Submitted by Felipe A. Hernández Moreno, Facebook Disney–ABC / BuzzFeed 
ID: 10724593 11. “It’s not that simple. You know what makes a good person good? When a good person does something bad, they own up to it. They try to learn something from it and they move on.”
– Ron Swanson, Parks and Recreation 
Submitted by Stephanie Comfort, Facebook 
ID: 10724601 12. “Strong is fighting. It’s hard and it’s painful and it’s every day. It’s what we have to do, and we can do it together, but if you’re too much of a coward for that, then burn.”
– Buffy Summers, Buffy the Vampire Slayer 
Submitted by Irene M. Cho, Facebook 
ID: 10724596 13. View this image › 
Submitted by jburke Disney–ABC / BuzzFeed 
ID: 10724751 14. “You can spend the rest of your life being afraid of people rejecting you. You have to start by not rejecting yourself. You don’t deserve it.”
– Rae Earl, My Mad Fat Diary 
Submitted by Monika Porch, Facebook 
ID: 10724612 15. “Tragedy blows through your life like a tornado, uprooting everything. Creating chaos. You wait for the dust to settle and then you choose. You can live in the wreckage and pretend it’s still the mansion you remember. Or you can crawl from the rubble and slowly rebuild.”
– Veronica Mars, Veronica Mars 
Submitted by Emily Weiss, Facebook 
ID: 10724611 16. View this image › 
Submitted by Lauren Elizabeth, Facebook Netflix / BuzzFeed 
ID: 10724598 17. “He’s trying to force you to like normal things. And you shouldn’t like things because people tell you you’re supposed to.”
– Jonathan Byers, Stranger Things 
Submitted by isabelv411400e74 
ID: 10724784 18. “Mourn the losses because they are many. But celebrate the victories, because they are few.”
– Debbie Novotny, Queer as Folk 
Submitted by Abby Friedman, Facebook 
ID: 10724607 19. View this image › 
Submitted by Samantha Marie Wysong, Facebook Disney–ABC / BuzzFeed 
ID: 10724698 20. “You spend your whole life looking for answers because you think the next answer would change something. Maybe make you a little less miserable. And you know that when you run out of questions you don’t just run out of answers. You run out of hope.”
– Thirteen, House 
Submitted by lenaa4b56df8f5 
ID: 10724750 21. “What I’m saying is that I think, maybe, the best things, the richest things aren’t supposed to come easily, and that sometimes the moments that make the most sense happen when everything else doesn’t and, well, I think you deserve more than popcorn tonight.”
– Juliet O’Hara, Psych 
Submitted by ethana49b358e9e 
ID: 10724721 22. View this image › 
Submitted by Stephanie McGinn, Facebook Disney–ABC / BuzzFeed 
ID: 10724697 23. “Never forget what you are, the rest of the world will not. Wear it like armour and it can never be used to hurt you.”
– Tyrion Lannister, Game of Thrones 
Submitted by kant0p 
ID: 10724772 24. “If you look for the light you will often find it. But if you look for the dark, it is all you will ever see.”
– Iroh, The Legend of Korra 
Submitted by anniek18 
ID: 10724715 25. View this image › 
Submitted by Samantha C. Sullivan, Facebook 20th Television / BuzzFeed 
ID: 10724614 26. “If I had known the last time I saw you would be the last time, I would have stopped to memorize your face, the way you move, everything about you. If I had known the last time I kissed you would have been the last time… I never would have stopped.”
– Mike Hannigan, Friends 
Submitted by aslia4dfb69e73 
ID: 10724790 27. “I like knowing that I did love you because it makes me think that I might be capable of something else great someday.”
– Shoshanna Shapiro, Girls 
Submitted by emmaw54 
ID: 10724776 28. View this image › 
Submitted by Justine Wesley, Facebook 20th Television / BuzzFeed 
ID: 10724696 29. “And when you find yourself lost in the darkness and despair, remember it’s only in the black of night you see the stars.”
– Coach Whitey Durham, One Tree Hill 
Submitted by kaiygarcia 
ID: 10724745 Want to be featured in similar BuzzFeed posts? Follow the BuzzFeed Community on Facebook and Twitter . ID: 10725065 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Jamie Jones is a senior staff writer for BuzzFeed and is based in London.
